metadata.title: CVE-2019-12098 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In the client side of Heimdal before 7.6.0, failure to verify anonymous PKINIT PA-PKINIT-KX key exchange permits a man-in-the-middle attack. This issue is in krb5_init_creds_step in lib/krb5/init_creds_pw.c.

notes.note: leosilva> it fails with a FTBFS on certs tests. This issue is probably related: https://github.com/heimdal/heimdal/issues/533.

criterions.comment: heimdal package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.5.0+dfsg-3build1').
